description: This source file handles server-side request processing in a Remix application, determining whether the request is from a bot or a browser and streaming HTML responses accordingly. It manages CORS headers, options requests, and rendering streams using React and Remix components.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler that sets CORS headers, handles OPTIONS requests, and delegates to bot or browser request handlers based on user-agent.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles rendering the response if the request comes from a bot, streaming the HTML content using React's renderToPipeableStream.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles rendering the response for browser requests, similarly streaming the HTML content.
